     A          B          C
     a          b          c
                a%8
               ~a%8
                        a>>(~a%8)
   a>>3
                a%8
          (a%8) ^ (a>>(~a%8))
                                    OUT ((a%8) ^ (a>>(~a%8)))%8
                                    REPEAT IF a>>3 â‰  0
                                      REPLACING a -> a>>3

nbits: floor(log2(a))+1
repeat count: ceil(nbits/3)-1

need repeat count: 15
nbits: 46,47,48
